_comment_11: STRIKE_1 is near ATM, STRIKE_2 is away from ATM
_comment_13: RATIO is used in credit/debit calculation as (away_strike_premium * RATIO - near_strike_premium)
_comment_14: Liquidity check, if 0 (False) illiquid options are considered while scanning, if 12, options having bid ask difference less than 12% considered
_comment_21: UPPER and LOWER Delta define the range for scanning in next expiries
_comment_23: Liquidity check, if 1 (TRUE) illiquid options are not considered while scanning, 0 (FALSE)
_comment_31: move tracker val 0.25 indicates short move, 0.7 indicates long move, 1 indicates full move
_comment_41: vol tracker perc 5 tracks vol of ticker whose vol is 20%, for every 1% vol move (5% of 20%)
_comment_51: no. of days to result is the days
